title: Basic Pharmacology Test
description: This exam tests basic knowledge of pharmacology concepts

questions.text: Which of the following is a beta-blocker?
questions.explanation: Propranolol is a non-selective beta blocker used in the treatment of hypertension and other cardiovascular conditions.

questions.text: What is the primary action of ACE inhibitors?

options.B: Prevent conversion of angiotensin I to angiotensin II

questions.explanation: ACE inhibitors prevent the conversion of angiotensin I to angiotensin II, thereby reducing blood pressure.

questions.text: Which drug class is used as a first-line treatment for type 2 diabetes?
questions.explanation: Metformin is the first-line medication for the treatment of type 2 diabetes, particularly in overweight and obese patients.
